reviews.review: Probably the best puzzle game of all time

este juego jamás envejece, el gueimplei es buenisimo, la atmosfera y la historia me encantan, incluso habiendolo rejugado varias veces me sigue matando de risa el humor con nuevas cosas que me encuentro, 0/10 no hay suficientes portal 3
deadass one of my favorite games
oyunu alın oynayın hem oyun oynuyorsunuz hem zekanız gelişiyor bazı yerleri kafayı zorluyor
Still great after so many years
Классная игра головоломка советую приобрести всем
Почему Р34 по Глэдос такие пососные? А потом спращивают, почему Уитли такой агрессивный.

Finally beat this game, never had the chance to do so on my PlayStation 3, and the ending was great, this game was just so amazing and really goes to show how much work and detail VALVe puts in their games
FPP where you need to think on resolution and not only shoot everything... :)
Офигенная игра, мне очень понравилось в частности сами порталы и их механика. Прям класс!

Best game ever made. No debate. If you disagree, you are dumb.

10/10
el mejor juego de todos asdasdasdadasdadasdasd

i shoot portal am rick sanchez










































yes
Juegazo que todo debería jugar al menos una vez en la vida.

genuinely one of, if not THE greatest games of all time in pretty much every aspect. i think there's probably only one or two other games out there that fall into the same category of 'games i straight up can't find anything wrong with,' and while valve not being able to count to 3 is the hit joke of the past couple decades, portal executed its story perfectly in just two main games, and that's really all it needs. anyways play portal 2 lol <3
eu tenho um nó nas bolas

제작자머리에서 어떻게 이런생각을 했지? 라는 생각이 나오는게임.

갓갓갓갓갓갓겜
Интересно за сколько бы прошел Энштейн
alın aldırtın bunu müq oyun. Kadın benimle dalga geçtikçe orgazm oluyorum.

Me lo compré porque había oido hablar de el y encontré una rebaja en steam de este y el primero por 1,5€ , el mejor euro y medio invertido de mi vida tanto este como el primero son juegazos y se convirtieron en uno de mis top 3 juegos favoritos

Игра очень глубока и хороша Головоломки + сопротивление 2-ух роботов Идеально. Всем советую поиграть.
Надеюсь что следуюшя часть юудет на 5+
Super love these puzzle games no matter how many years pass

I can't really describe in words how much I love this game!
I paid like 2€ for this game and its 1000x more worth

Soundtrack - 1000/100 (Still alive from portal 1 is one of my favourite songs)
Gameplay - 100/100
Story - 1000/100
Character - 100/100
Portal Guns - 100/100

I can recommend this game to everyone :)

Have a great day and thanks for this fantastic experience!!
What's there to say, there were portals
A masterpiece with lots of mind bending puzzles . Also has very good storytelling
Good, very good. Good game. Thumbs up, good game.
嗯....这个游戏，我大概是通了六七次关了，合作模式通了一半（和路人）毕竟我没有玩这游戏的朋友
